user.description:
The utility meter sensor provides functionality to track consumptions of various utilities (e.g., energy, gas, water, heating) over a configured period of time, typically monthly. The utility meter sensor also supports splitting the consumption by tariffs.
Meter reset offset allows offsetting the day of monthly meter reset.
Supported tariffs is a comma separated list of supported tariffs, leave empty if only a single tariff is needed.
user.title: New Utility Meter
